String.string: I commend you on behalf of the Valkyon Federation for your victories on the field!

Join alone or with a party of up to 5 members. If your item level is at or below 448, you will receive equalized PvP gear. Score points by defeating opponents or monsters, or controlling pyres. You must reach the target score first to win.

[RAID] Does not progress quests! Join with your own 15-player raid. Score points by defeating opponents, monsters, and controlling pyres. Pyres generate points while burning blue. First raid to reach the target score, wins.

[Equalized] Does not progress quests! Players enter the battle wearing superior equalized PvP gear. You can customize the gear and jewelry with crystals. Score points by defeating opponents, monsters, and controlling pyres. First side to reach the target score, wins.

Seize 3 sites. Reward varies depending on your result.
[Win]
8 Champion's Enchanting Chests
[Lose]
5 Champion's Enchanting Chests
A team with higher score wins.

[Victory Reward]
216,000 Bellicarium Credits
Veteran’s Shard Chest ×3

[Defeat Reward]
72,000 Bellicarium Credits
Veteran’s Shard Chest ×1
Defeat enemy team within the time limit. Earn the Battle Points for your team. Killing enemies earns more Battle Points. Only available to players levels 40–64.

Check the battleground description to confirm which versions will not progress quests. Different battlegrounds have different queue requirements. Skilled or experienced players can queue as group leader. If your group changes, you need to cancel your current request and queue again. Your character profile displays your PvP record for all battlegrounds. Have fun, and try not to die!
Join as a team to go up against other teams. Your Champions' Skyring personal ranking applies to both team and solo matches.
Join with a 5 player party of all different classes and no more than one healing class. Defeat all opponents to win a round. First team to win two rounds is the victor.
Join as a solo player and be matched with a party. Defeat all opponents to win a round. First team to win two rounds is the victor.
Join as a solo player to go up against other solos. All players receive equalized PvP gear. Your Champions' Skyring personal ranking applies to both team and solo matches.
Both teams take turns to attack and defend the Anchorstone. The first team to destroy the opponents’ Anchorstone wins.

Join with your own 20-player raid. In round one, the defenders' goal is to protect the anchorstone for 15 minutes. In round two, the teams switch roles, and the attackers must destroy it before time runs out.

[Victory Reward]
216,000 Bellicarium Credits
Veteran’s Shard Chest ×4

[Defeat Reward]
72,000 Bellicarium Credits
Veteran’s Shard Chest ×2

Join as a solo player. A team of federation players battles a trio of kumas players. The federation players must find and return three pieces of kumas rock candy within the time limit. The kumas players must stop them from reaching a loading dock with the rock candy.

All combatants become kumases. Your team wins if your Kumas Boss has more HP at the end of the match than your enemies' Kumas Boss. Work together to protect your Kumas Boss, and damage the enemies' Courser!
Available only during Wintera! You win the round when the entire opposing team is dead. If both teams are not eliminated until the timer runs out, the team with more survivors will win.

[Seasonal Battleground]

Regular character skills cannot be used on the Wintera Snowfield. All characters have the same HP regardless of level. (HP recovery may vary depending on character level.)
Gather snowballs scattered on the snowfield. Use them to damage your opponents, open ice chests for more attacks, and open warm-up boxes for defenses.

A chance to go back to your childhood during Wintera! You win the round when the entire opposing team is dead. If both teams are not eliminated until the timer runs out, the team with more survivors will win.

[Seasonal Battleground]

Regular character skills cannot be used on the Wintera Snowfield. All characters have the same HP regardless of level. (HP recovery may vary depending on character level.)
Gather snowballs scattered on the snowfield. Use them to damage your opponents, open ice chests for more attacks, and open warm-up boxes for defenses.
Compete against another team to defeat monsters and earn points. Leaders buy skills to buff teammates, debuff opponents, or harry opponents with more monsters.
Your allies recover 8% of max HP every 10 seconds.
Your allies' Attack Speed increases by 15%.
Decreases opponents' resistance to knockdown by 20%.
Summons swift minions to the opponents' ring for 12 seconds 1 minute into the round. Failing to kill each minion will deduct 100 points.
Summons swift minions to the opponents' ring for 12 seconds 2 minutes into the round. Failing to kill each minion will deduct 100 points.
Summons swift minions to the opponents' ring for 12 seconds 3 minutes into the round. Failing to kill each minion will deduct 100 points.
Summons swift minions to the opponents' ring for 12 seconds 4 minutes into the round. Failing to kill each minion will deduct 100 points.
Summons swift minions to the opponents' ring for 12 seconds 5 minutes into the round. Failing to kill each minion will deduct 100 points.
Summons powerful minions to the opponents' ring for 12 seconds 1 minute into the round. Failing to kill each minion will deduct 100 points.
Summons powerful minions to the opponents' ring for 12 seconds 2 minutes into the round. Failing to kill each minion will deduct 100 points.
Summons powerful minions to the opponents' ring for 12 seconds 3 minutes into the round. Failing to kill each minion will deduct 100 points.
Summons powerful minions to the opponents' ring for 12 seconds 4 minutes into the round. Failing to kill each minion will deduct 100 points.
Summons powerful minions to the opponents' ring for 12 seconds 5 minutes into the round. Failing to kill each minion will deduct 100 points.
Increases max HP of all monsters spawned in opponent's ring by 25%.
Increases power of all monsters spawned in opponent's ring by 30%.
Ongoing damage decreases opponents' HP by 10% of max every 5 seconds.

Attack your opponents with water bombs.
You can't use any of your normal skills here on the Coastal Battleground. Each character has the same amount of HP regardless of level.

Attack your opponents with water bombs and touch water balloons that have opponents trapped in them to defeat them. Touch a water balloon with an ally trapped inside to free them! If neither team is totally eliminated when the time runs out, then the team with the most players remaining wins.

Join as a solo player, and destroy opponents using tanks. The team with the most players left alive after 6 minutes wins the round, and winning two out of three rounds wins the match. (Can be entered a maximum of 8 times per day.)

Regular character skills cannot be used in Iron Battleground. All characters have the same HP regardless of level. (HP recovery may vary depending on character level.) Attack opponents with tanks, artillery, or mines. Damaged tanks can be repaired by ramming a Repair Pylon. Players receive equalized Conflict gear. Players on foot have anti-tank skills, but are vulnerable to enemy tanks.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#80E71C'>Why You Won: </FONT>Your team destroyed the anchorstone faster than your opponents.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FF0000'>Why You Lost: </FONT>Your team took longer to destroy the anchorstone.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#80E71C'>Why You Won: </FONT>The opponent team's time ran out.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FF0000'>Why You Lost: </FONT>Your time ran out.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#80E71C'>Why You Won: </FONT>Your team fended off the enemies longer than the opponent team did.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FF0000'>Why You Lost: </FONT>Your team was slower than your opponents.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#80E71C'>Why You Won: </FONT>You took all the candies.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FF0000'>Why You Lost: </FONT>All your candy are belong to them.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#80E71C'>Why You Won: </FONT>Time ran out.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FF0000'>Why You Lost: </FONT>Time ran out.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#80E71C'>Why You Won: </FONT>Got the desired score.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FF0000'>Why You Lost: </FONT>Your opponents got the desired score.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#80E71C'>Why You Won:</FONT> Eliminated all opponents or have more survivors in your group.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FF0000'>Why You Lost:</FONT> Your team has been eliminated or have less survivors in your group.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#80E71C'>Why You Won: </FONT>Got the desired kill counts.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FF0000'>Why You Lost: </FONT>Your opponents got the desired kill count.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#80E71C'>Why You Won: </FONT>You scored higher than your opponents.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FF0000'>Why You Lost: </FONT>You scored lower than your opponents.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FFA100'>Why You Drew: </FONT>You and your opponents had the same number of survivors.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FFA100'>Why You Drew: </FONT>Your opponents don't have enough players.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FFA100'>Why You Drew: </FONT>Your team doesn't have enough players.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#80E71C'>Why You Won: </FONT>Your team won more rounds.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FF0000'>Why You Lost: </FONT>Your opponents won more rounds.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FFA100'>Why You Drew: </FONT>One of the teams doesn't have enough players.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#80E71C'>Draw : </FONT>The teams performed equally well.
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FFA100'>Victory : </FONT>Your team outperformed the other team!
<FONT SIZE='18' COLOR='#FFA100'>Lose : </FONT>The other team outperformed your team.
Earn points by capturing sites and defeating monsters. Reach the target score before the opponent team.

Join a battlefield fight to win 3 pyres. You must reach the target score first to win.
Rewards vary depending on your results: [Victory] or
[Defeat].

[Victory Reward]
135,000 Bellicarium Credits
Veteran’s Plate Chest ×4

[Defeat Reward]
45,000 Bellicarium Credits
Veteran’s Plate Chest ×2
